detaileddescription.para: Draw the taskbar in a workspace.

parameterdescription.para: Whether the workspace should reposition the taskbar.

A hashtable containing information about the widgets.

detaileddescription.para: Create a new workspace with the specified name.

parameterdescription.para: The desired name of the workspace, orNULL.

detaileddescription.para: Get the name of a workspace.
